column4: Hello all, kinda having a issue with my server: I accidently used apt-get install php5 & (note the &) and keeps running although detatched.
I've killed it with ps x a few times but keeps coming back
that should bring apt back to the terminal
are you sure apt is still running?
ps x: 20092 pts/0    T      0:00 apt-get install php5-
apt is run with sudo must be killed with sudo
it doesn't do anything with sudo either
send the sigkill signal a signal that processes can not avoid
